text: Muli murie mularusinjia khunjila ya Nyasaye, ne nibiaNyasaye biosi bili khushialo nende mwikulu, shibali nashilala tawe owayiinia mwinywe nikhushili okhufungula Makka, mana nalwaana, abo bali nende omurungo omukhongo okhushila balia bayinia Makka niyikulwe, mana nibalwana, ne boosi Nyasaye yabalaka amalayi, ne Nyasaye amanyile koosi pe kamukholanga
